message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much. Take it or leave it!
You're being a bit stingy, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. Accept this offer and we can move on!
I'm starting to get a bit impatient. I'll meet you halfway this time, but don't expect me to give away too much more!
